results.name: Even bisection of A257244: a(n) = A257244(2n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2047
formula: a(n) = A020639(A256393(2n)). [Equally, the smallest prime factor of A256393(2n).]
xref: Cf. also A257245 (the other bisection), A257247 (gives the positions where both bisections have the same value).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 19 2015
